parameters.name: Sd
parameters.description: True for single-ended, false for double-ended

parameters.name: Flip
parameters.description: Not used

parameters.name: Dir
parameters.description: True to reverse the direction of the extrude, false to not

parameters.name: T1
parameters.description: Termination type for first end as defined in swEndConditions_e

parameters.name: T2
parameters.description: Termination type for second end as defined in swEndConditions_e

parameters.name: D1
parameters.description: Depth of extrusion for first end in meters

parameters.name: D2
parameters.description: Depth of extrusion for second end in meters

parameters.name: Dchk1
parameters.description: True allows draft angle in first direction, false does not allow drafting

parameters.name: Dchk2
parameters.description: True allows draft angle in second direction, false does not allow drafting

parameters.name: Ddir1
parameters.description: True for first draft angle to be outward, false for first draft angle to be inward

parameters.name: Ddir2
parameters.description: True for second draft angle to be outward, false for second draft angle to be inward

parameters.name: Dang1
parameters.description: Draft angle for first end

parameters.name: Dang2
parameters.description: Draft angle for second end

parameters.name: OffsetReverse1
parameters.description: If you choose to offset the first end condition from another face or plane, then true specifies the offset from the face or plane in a direction away from the sketch, and false specifies the offset in a direction toward the sketch

parameters.name: OffsetReverse2
parameters.description: If you choose to offset the second end condition from another face or plane, then true specifies the offset from the face or plane in a direction away from the sketch, and false specifies the offset in a direction toward the sketch

parameters.name: TranslateSurface1
parameters.description: If you specified T1 as swEndConditions_e .swEndCondOffsetFromSurface, then true specifies that the end of the extrusion is a translation of the reference surface, and false specifies to use a true offset

parameters.name: TranslateSurface2
parameters.description: If you specified T2 as swEndConditions_e .swEndCondOffsetFromSurface, then true specifies that the end of the extrusion is a translation of the reference surface, and false specifies to use a true offset

parameters.name: CapEnd1
parameters.description: True to cap first end, false to not

parameters.name: CapEnd2
parameters.description: True to cap second end, false to not

parameters.name: DeleteOriginalFace
parameters.description: True to delete original faces, false to not (see Remarks )

parameters.name: KnitResult
parameters.description: True to knit the extrusion result, false to not (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Sd
parameters.description: True for single-ended, false for double-ended

parameters.name: Flip
parameters.description: Not used

parameters.name: Dir
parameters.description: True to reverse the direction of the extrude, false to not

parameters.name: T1
parameters.description: Termination type for first end as defined in swEndConditions_e

parameters.name: T2
parameters.description: Termination type for second end as defined in swEndConditions_e

parameters.name: D1
parameters.description: Depth of extrusion for first end in meters

parameters.name: D2
parameters.description: Depth of extrusion for second end in meters

parameters.name: Dchk1
parameters.description: True allows draft angle in first direction, false does not allow drafting

parameters.name: Dchk2
parameters.description: True allows draft angle in second direction, false does not allow drafting

parameters.name: Ddir1
parameters.description: True for first draft angle to be outward, false for first draft angle to be inward

parameters.name: Ddir2
parameters.description: True for second draft angle to be outward, false for second draft angle to be inward

parameters.name: Dang1
parameters.description: Draft angle for first end

parameters.name: Dang2
parameters.description: Draft angle for second end

parameters.name: OffsetReverse1
parameters.description: If you choose to offset the first end condition from another face or plane, then true specifies the offset from the face or plane in a direction away from the sketch, and false specifies the offset in a direction toward the sketch

parameters.name: OffsetReverse2
parameters.description: If you choose to offset the second end condition from another face or plane, then true specifies the offset from the face or plane in a direction away from the sketch, and false specifies the offset in a direction toward the sketch

parameters.name: TranslateSurface1
parameters.description: If you specified T1 as swEndConditions_e .swEndCondOffsetFromSurface, then true specifies that the end of the extrusion is a translation of the reference surface, and false specifies to use a true offset

parameters.name: TranslateSurface2
parameters.description: If you specified T2 as swEndConditions_e .swEndCondOffsetFromSurface, then true specifies that the end of the extrusion is a translation of the reference surface, and false specifies to use a true offset

parameters.name: CapEnd1
parameters.description: True to cap first end, false to not

parameters.name: CapEnd2
parameters.description: True to cap second end, false to not

parameters.name: DeleteOriginalFace
parameters.description: True to delete original faces, false to not (see Remarks )

parameters.name: KnitResult
parameters.description: True to knit the extrusion result, false to not (see Remarks )

remarks:
Before calling this method:
Select the base of the extrusion surface:
Sketch; call
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
with selection mark 0.
Sketch segments; call IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2 with selection mark 0 or 4.
Single planar face; call IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2 with selection mark 0.
Multiple co-planar faces; call IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2 with selection mark 0 for the first planar face and selection mark 256 for other co-planar faces.
Select the entity reference for the direction of the extrusion by calling IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2 with selection mark 16. If no entity is selected, the direction of extrusion is normal to the selected extrusion surface.
DeleteOriginalFace and KnitResult are ignored if the extrusion is in two directions.
KnitResult is ignored if DeleteOriginalFace is false.
